Document:
## Mortality
[color=#999999][italic]-135 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Grants the target an unlimited amount of self revives.
## Weakness
[color=#999999][italic]-35 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Cuts all damage the contractee takes in half. - Increases holy damage taken.
## Avarice
[color=#999999][italic]-30 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Allows the contractee to devour things whole, just like a dragon.
## Fear of Death
[color=#999999][italic]-25 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee have no critical state. You stand, or you die.
## Death
[color=#999999][italic]-25 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Allows the contractee to revive themselves exactly once on death. - Default on every contract.
## Shadows
[color=#999999][italic]-25 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee invisible.
## Brokeness
[color=#999999][italic]-20 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Grants the contractee a pair of sick fucking jays, signed by Micheal Jordan himself.
## Fear of Fire
[color=#999999][italic]-20 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee immune to fire, and immune to being lit on fire.
## Chance
[color=#999999][italic]-15 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Grants the contractee a completely random clause. Want to try your luck?
## Fear of Light
[color=#999999][italic]-15 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee immune to flashes.
## Fear of Electricity
[color=#999999][italic]-15 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee immune to electrical shocks.
## Gluttony
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee not need food or water.
## Fear of Drowning
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Disables the contractees need to breathe.
## Fear of Clowns
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Disables the contractees ability to slip.
## Fear of Crushing
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee immune to pressure damage.
## Fear of Freezing
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee immune to low temperatures.
## Greed
[color=#999999][italic]-10 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Grants the target a ton of cash-money.
## Pain
[color=#999999][italic]-5 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee feel no pain, and suffer no negatives from pain.
## Inner Peace
[color=#999999][italic]5 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Grants the target peace. Everlasting.
## Voice
[color=#999999][italic]20 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Permanently mutes the contractee.
## A hand
[color=#999999][italic]20 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Immediately severs one of the contractees hands.
## A leg
[color=#999999][italic]20 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Immediately severs one of the contractees legs.
## Soul Ownership
[color=#999999][italic]25 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Transfers ownership of a soul to the contractor. - Default on every contract.
## Strength
[color=#999999][italic]30 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee take double damage.
## Coherence
[color=#999999][italic]30 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Makes the contractee clumsy and messes up their speech.
## Awake
[color=#999999][italic]35 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Turns the target narcoleptic.
## An organ
[color=#999999][italic]30 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Dumps one of the contractees organs on the ground. - This is most likely the heart.
## Legs
[color=#999999][italic]40 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Permanently paralyzes both of the contractees legs.
## Sight
[color=#999999][italic]60 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Permanently blinds the contractee.
## Will to fight
[color=#999999][italic]60 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Permanently pacifies the contractee.
## Humanity
[color=#999999][italic]80 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Turns the contractee into a frog. - This is permanent.
## Time
[color=#999999][italic]150 Weight[/italic][/color]
- Kills the contractee after five minutes.
